scripts.clean: rimraf ../third_party/out/skia/web demo/build demo/wasm demo/wasm-mt demo/.*.md5 demo/*.js demo/*.map demo/cmake-build-*
scripts.build: npm run build:skia && source ../third_party/skia/third_party/externals/emsdk/emsdk_env.sh && node script/cmake.demo.js -a wasm-mt && rollup -c ./script/rollup.demo.js --environment ARCH:wasm-mt
scripts.build:st: npm run build:skia:st && source ../third_party/skia/third_party/externals/emsdk/emsdk_env.sh && node script/cmake.demo.js -a wasm && rollup -c ./script/rollup.demo.js --environment ARCH:wasm
